main event: A soldier observed a pale red streak in the sky while stationed at Camp Hood, Texas on July 11, 1949.
interesting points: The object appeared twice as large as the evening star,The observed streak had a brighter red color than tracer ammunition,The object moved fast and disappeared quickly as if turning off a light,The direction of the object was West by Southwest,There were no photographs or physical evidence obtained from the sighting.
sighted object: a pale red streak in the sky
witness description: Sgt. (name redacted), Co 'A', 42nd Armd Inf Bn., 2d Armored Division
